p: The essential oils of lemon grass and eucalyptus showed significant reduction in biomass production of all the four fungi tested viz. A. niger, F. udum, F. oxysporum and M. grisea. The amount of biomass produced in milligrams was measured after 72 h for A. niger, F. udum, F. oxysporum and after 7 days for M. Grisea. Citral is the most effective among the major components tested, followed by citronellal and geraniol ( Figure 10b and f).
